sign

public byte[] sign(byte[] input,
                   RSAPrivateKey privateKey,
                   java.lang.String digestName)
            throws CryptoUtilsException
Signs the digest of the input data using RSA and the selected digest

Parameters:
input - Input message to be signed
privateKey - Key to be used to sign the message
digestName - Name of the digest function to use, see supported functions in AndroidCryptoUtils as public static attributes of this class
Returns:
A byte array containing the sing of digest of the input message
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException

Verify a message signature using the public key and the original message

Parameters:
input - Original message
sign - Sign of the message
publicKey - Key that will be used to verify sign
digestName - Digest Function Name used for sign the message
Returns:
TRUE if the sign is OK, FALSE otherwise
